item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hi! I’m Danilo and I’m Infosec guy. I created this blog to talk about Infosec related stuff that I hope you will enjoy. Whenever I have some time I play CTF/Wargames with TheGoonies CTF Team (CTFtime).

You can contact me on Twitter @DaniloNC or on IRC (danilonc@irc.freenode.net).
